title: New Song of Inspiration

tokens.lyric: Upon the earth I came to life in the world God pre

lines.raw: [A]Upon the earth I came to life in the world God pre[Bm]pared. [E7]
[F#m]Sacrifice your[D]self and [A]live, all for His de[A]sire, [E7]all for His de[A]sire.

tokens.lyric: All Heaven sings a mighty song, inspiration divine,

lines.raw: All Heaven sings a mighty song, inspiration divine,

tokens.lyric: For a new Eden begins now, spread the message to all.

lines.raw: For a new Eden begins now, spread the message to all.

tokens.lyric: Sacrifice yourself to build, our Lord's new world of life.

lines.raw: Sacrifice yourself to build, our Lord's new world of life.

tokens.lyric: Seek the land of freedom now, all for His desire, all for His desire.

lines.raw: Seek the land of freedom now, all for His desire, all for His desire.

tokens.lyric: We seek the new eternal base, blessed family of God,

lines.raw: We seek the new eternal base, blessed family of God,

tokens.lyric: Long awaited by the Father, God of goodness above.

lines.raw: Long awaited by the Father, God of goodness above.

tokens.lyric: Now proclaim the great new Truth, of kindness and good will.

lines.raw: Now proclaim the great new Truth, of kindness and good will.

tokens.lyric: Pioneer new Heaven and earth, all for His desire, all for His desire.

lines.raw: Pioneer new Heaven and earth, all for His desire, all for His desire.

tokens.lyric: Within a day of bright new life, stand upholding the right;

lines.raw: Within a day of bright new life, stand upholding the right;

tokens.lyric: In the pure new life eternal raise the standard of good.

lines.raw: In the pure new life eternal raise the standard of good.

tokens.lyric: Praise the Father of all good, our glorious true ideal;

lines.raw: Praise the Father of all good, our glorious true ideal;

tokens.lyric: Build a whole new world of peace; we will build it now,

lines.raw: Build a whole new world of peace; we will build it now,
